description.translate: Beyond the horizon comes a force that no man can tame.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Vent septemtrional\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Par-delà l'horizon nous vient une\"}","{\"text\":\"§7force qu'aucun homme ne sait dompter.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Beyond the horizon comes a force\"}","{\"text\":\"§7that no man can tame.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7抗§a1 §7速度§a1 §7攻速§a1\"}"]}}
